channel.title: travis on Alfred Nutile
channel.description: Recent content in travis on Alfred Nutile

item.title: Capistrano for non-rails sites
item.description: I've been using capistrano for Rails and really impressed by how easy it makes deployment and rolllback. Sometimes though I need this type of automation on non-rails work. This type of automation can include setting up a vhost in Apache as well as Travis CI work. I know Chef-solo might be best for this but since I am already in Capistrano I might as well push it a little more.
